document.full_text: ally financial filed for an initial public offering that will allow the u.s. government to sell down its majority stake in the bailed-out auto and mortgage lender.
document.title: ally files for ipo, readies for treasury sell-down
lines_and_colors: ally financial filed for an initial public offering that will allow the u.s. government to sell down its majority stake in the bailed-out auto and mortgage lender.
